content.raw:
This PR has been updated with a complete fix. Couple of caveats:

The fix is Unix-only since I couldn't quite make Boost work for me. I'm going to let @gerkey and @\_jrivero\_ worry about this :)

I have not made a test. It would probably be a unit test for InsertModelWidget.
content.html:
This PR has been updated with a complete fix. Couple of caveats:

The fix is Unix-only since I couldn't quite make Boost work for me. I'm going to let @gerkey and @_jrivero_ worry about this :)

I have not made a test. It would probably be a unit test for InsertModelWidget.
